example.description: Simple example of some jml which is repeated. The button removes an item from the model when pressed.
example.source: <a:model id="mdlRepeat"> <data> <item>label 1</item> <item>label 2</item> <item>label 3</item> <item>label 4</item> <item>label 5</item> <item>label 6</item> </data> </a:model> <a:repeat model="mdlRepeat" nodeset="item"> <a:hbox height="24" width="200"> <a:label ref="[text()]" /> <a:button>Ok</a:button> </a:hbox> </a:repeat> <a:button onclick = " apf.xmldb.removeNode(mdlRepeat.queryNode('item[2]')); this.disable() ">Remove item</a:button> <a:button onclick = " mdlRepeat.appendXml('<item>new label</item>'); ">Add item</a:button>
